<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Given a call or invoke instruction to the elide safe coroutine, this function</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// does the following:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  - Allocate a frame for the callee coroutine in the caller using alloca.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  - Replace the old CB with a new Call or Invoke to &#96;NewCallee&#96;, with the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    pointer to the frame as an additional argument to NewCallee.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62" lineLink="#a1e38dc7f1aecace87c3977df3d96e680"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="#a1e38dc7f1aecace87c3977df3d96e680">processCall</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callbase">CallBase</a> &#42;CB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &#42;Caller, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &#42;NewCallee,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// introduction of two pesudo lifetime intrinsics in the frontend around the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
